update tb_enterprise_user set UNION_CHAIRMAN = #{unionChairman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPENDITURE_DIRECTOR = #{expenditureDirector,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WOMEN_DIRECTOR = #{womenDirector,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEETING_TIME2 = #{meetingTime2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEETING_SITE = #{meetingSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YD_NUM = #{ydNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SD_NUM = #{sdNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMMITTEES = #{committees,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REAL_EXPENDITURE_COMMITTEES = #{realExpenditureCommittees,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELECTION_RESULTS_REPORT = #{electionResultsReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMBERSHIP_TRADE_COMMITTEES = #{membershipTradeCommittees,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LETTER_COMMITMENT_PRESIDENT = #{letterCommitmentPresident,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VOTES_OBTAINED = #{votesObtained,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTRATION_GRASS_TRADE = #{registrationGrassTrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUMMARY_TABLE_WOMEN_COMMITTEES = #{summaryTableWomenCommittees,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ENTERPRISE_ID = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_enterprise_user set OPERATOR_CONTACTS = #{operatorContacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNION_PRESIDENT_IDCARD = #{unionPresidentIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CORPORATE_IDENTITY_CARD = #{corporateIdentityCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDENTITY_CARD_AGENT = #{identityCardAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELECTRONIC_VERSION = #{electronicVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ENTERPRISE_ID = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_enterprise_user where ENTERPRISE_ACCOUNT = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
